attributes.title: Do not use this app!!!
attributes.review: This app is slow and has inappropriate images of the president. I’m also suspicious of users information being taken from this app. DO NOT USE IT. Highly inappropriate and a waste of time overall. Bad policies, morbidly obese, shows predators, and overall a waste of space.

attributes.title: Dumb and a waste of space
attributes.review: I opened the app just to see the racist hypocrite standing in front of our flag which is horrible bc I do not stand with him at all and after all he has done and threatens to do we should just not download this app. A president is supposed to protect and lead not threaten his ppl by making them bow down to him! THIS IS NOT A MONARCHY!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.review: This is probably the worst app I have every used in my life. It needs to be removed immediately!! 🤢🤢🤢 all of the pictures of that cheeto puff left permanent scars on my 5 year old?? He cries every night since I downloaded it because of how traumatized he is, I’ve had to take him to therapy every day since!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD OR PUT THIS TO APP NEAR CHILDREN!! 😖😖😖

attributes.title: im scared of this big cheeto
attributes.review: this app... well what is there to say. this app scares me. i never been so scared in my life. i just wanted to see the news but i open the app and see big cheeto with its fist up and looks ready to throw a punch. i dodge it. i dont know what i have done to be almost PUNCHED by big cheeto. stay safe everyone, do not get this app.

attributes.title: This app steals your data and will track you
attributes.review: I opened the app to find it immediately downloaded all of my contacts and asked for access to my camera roll, camera, and microphone. Be careful when using this app or even just keeping it on your phone.

attributes.title: Very disappointed
attributes.review: I was trying to purchase hundreds of MAGA shirts for my entire extended families upcoming party. Unfortunately the app kept crashing and wouldn’t let me purchase. I will need to speak to the manager and Mr. Trump please. I am very upset because I cannot support the most R̸̢̯͈͎̩͕͓̀͂͛̉̐̂̏͂̎͌̈́̅̏̈́̍̍̀͠͝ä̸̢͓̰̗̱̣͉̠̯̫̻̪̭͉̖̇̓̿̑̕c̵̡̧̥͉̘̳̰͚̪̰̥̼̪̹̣̞͌̚î̸̢̛̠̜̣͚̖͚͇̖̳̝͚̰̋͋̇̐͛̃͝s̵̹͚̤̩͐̒̀̇̈́̓͊̆̀͑̌̐͘͘̕͘͜͝͝͠t̸̟̳̮̤̗̜̹͎̫͓̟͚̱̦̟̠̺̒͊̉̉̒̓̑  president I have ever seen 👎😓

attributes.title: Trump killed my cat’s turtle’s hamster 😭
attributes.review: I got this app and immediately my cat’s turtle’s hamster died after drinking bleach to rid himself of the Corona as the Cheeto instructed. I couldn’t be more upset. The aliens had to come down to take the poor little guy to the big hamster wheel in the sky. Save your cat’s turtle’s hamster’s lives everywhere and don’t repeat my mistake 😭😭😭

attributes.title: very dry would not recommend
attributes.review: i mean i downloaded and first 30 minutes if playing i just couldnt find anything else to do? the big scary cheeto man was EVERYWHERE?? i think its like their mascot or smth would definitely change that. and like it asked for my number? a bunch of PERVS if you ask me. do not download !!!

attributes.title: Terrible app👁👄👁
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my doge cat saw it so now he got pink eye. We took him to chick fila to get him fixed up but he had a severe problem of kidney congestion infection mayo pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis diarrhea. So I warn you not to download this app, now go ahead and give it a 1 star or you’ll get the same infection my doge cat got.😾😭

attributes.title: Soggy Chicken Nugget
attributes.review: So....I got this app to pay respects to the obese Cheeto man because I heard that he passed away. (Fly high orange man). Anyways...I did not enjoy the app at all. It was worthless and make me feel bad about myself. I then discovered that Donald did not pass away. I do not recommend this app. Horrible. Worst app ever. Does anyone actually like this app!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!😹😹😹😹
